cardTitle: Kids Community Football and Summer Fun Days
cardBlurb: Long Ashton Community Football, which started up in May, is providing fun and inclusive football sessions for Long Ashton and surrounding areas. Well attended by children from the community, the atmosphere and enthusiasm among the groups has been fantastic. The sessions are all about fun and building relationships whilst gaining a love for sport and physical activity.
cardDateTimes: Saturdays 1-3pm. Summer  Holiday Fun days  will take place on 9th,10th & 11th August 2021 between 10am-2pm. Places will be limited so advice is to book early to avoid disappointment. Ring Nicholas on 07852556274 to book

cardBlurb: A girls's cricket team exclusively for Year-6 and upwards. Have fun mixing with other girls, as well as learning the skills of the game. If you’re already taking part in our mixed sessions, and would like to carry on, then that’s fine. But if you’d be happier in a female only environment, then this is the team for you. If you’re a mum or older sister who’d like to help on the coaching side. we’d love to hear from you too.Practice sessions are on Tuesdays, 6pm at Flaxmead.

If your child loves to play trains then look no further. Children’s event with rides on trains, giant track layouts, build your own tracks, Thomas Minis, superstations and lots more. We also offer sibling discount.
cardDateTimes: Wednesday 18th August 10.15-11.15 and 11.30-12.30 - Book now - somersetnorth@trainmaster.co.uk

cardBlurb: Mobile role play City for the under 5’s to explore, discover and enjoy. Utilising bespoke backdrops and specially selected high-quality toys and equipment.
Pilates is strong at the Hub and there is sure to be a group and instructor to suit you whatever your level - come and stretch and relax
cardDateTimes: Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays: Daytime and Evening sessions available

cardBlurb: Interested in writing a novel? Or perhaps some short stories or maybe a memoir. Whatever your writing interests let us know if you'd like to join a new creative writing group.
Bring your little ones to this fun play group and meet other local mums and dads
Why not book the Hub for your wedding? With capacity for up to 150 guests and the beautiful countryside views for your photos the Hub makes a great venue

The Hub is a great venue for birthday parties whatever the age! The main hall is large enough for bouncy castles and traditional games like 'pass the parcel' and 'musical chairs.' The smaller partitioned area is perfect for laying out the birthday meal. 10% Discount for local residents applies.
Pretty much the most awesome workout ever. Dance to great music, with great people, and burn a ton of calories without even realizing it. Zumba is coming to the Hub soon
